alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Western Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued October 22 at 4:02PM AKDT until October 24 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...High Surf will wash to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Western Arctic Coast, Kivalina and Red Dog Dock, Shishmaref, Bering Strait Coast, Southern Seward Peninsula Coast and St Lawrence Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Beach erosion will occur, especially on south and west facing shorelines. Minor flooding of low lying areas is possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...South winds gusting to 40 mph will develop tonight and continue into Monday night. Channeled areas such as the Bering Strait, St Lawrence Island and Point Hope will see gust to 70 mph. These strong winds will cause sea levels to rise several feet and push large waves onshore, especially along south facing shores. The winds will decrease Monday night into Tuesday, and surf should decrease Tuesday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Kivalina and Red Dog Dock; Shishmaref; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island; Western Arctic Coast
